---
title: "Updating File Paths"
---



This notebook contains an example of how to update file paths for reading and writing raw and intermediate data products. Please read this before trying to run any notebooks.


```{r}
file_path <- "~/Library/CloudStorage/Box-Box/MEDS-SBBG-milkweed"

test_folder <- file.path(file_path, "test")

test_data <- terra::rast(file.path(test_folder, "canopy_cover_cleaned.tif"))


terra::writeRaster(test_data, here(file_path, "test", "test_data.tif"))
```
